content: Don't give it to Tom. Give it to Mary.
translations: ita:Non darla a Tom. Dalla a Mary
ita:Non darlo a Tom. Dallo a Mary
ita:Non datela a Tom. Datela a Mary
ita:Non datelo a Tom. Datelo a Mary
ita:Non la dia a Tom. La dia a Mary
ita:Non lo dia a Tom. Lo dia a Mary
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by CK (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
